Name: Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh
information: Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 4 outdoor swimming pools, a nightclub, and outdoor tennis courts. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze.You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Four Seasons Resort Sharm EL Sheikh, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the beach bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Sharm El Sheikh? This hotel has facilities measuring 861 square feet (80 square meters), including a conference center. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free valet parking is available onsite.Make yourself at home in one of the 136 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and minibars.Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Shark's Bay - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi SOHO Square - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi Shark Bay - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi Shark's Bay Beach - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi Sharm El Sheikh Golf Resort - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi Jackson Reef - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi Rehana Beach - 9.6 km / 6 mi Nabq Bay - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi Hollywood Sharm El Sheikh - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi Cleo Park - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi Naama Bay - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi Nabq Protected Area - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi Naama Bay Beach - 18 km / 11.2 mi Sharm Old Town - 20 km / 12.4 mi Sharm Old Market - 21 km / 13 mi The preferred airport for Four Seasons Resort Sharm EL Sheikh is Sharm El-Sheikh Intl. Airport (SSH) - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi When you stay at Four Seasons Resort Sharm EL Sheikh in Sharm El Sheikh, you'll be on the beach, within a 15-minute drive of SOHO Square and Nabq Bay. This 5-star hotel is 8.8 mi (14.1 km) from Naama Bay and 0.3 mi (0.4 km) from Shark's Bay.Near SOHO Square

Name: Aida Hotel Sharm El Sheikh
information:
Located in Ras Umm El Sid, 1 km from the Old Market, Aida Hotel offers spacious rooms with balconies and free Wi-Fi. It overlooks Sharm El Maya and features an outdoor pool.

The air-conditioned rooms of Aida Hotel are decorated in a traditional style with wooden furniture. All rooms include a TV and minibar.

Breakfast is served daily in the hotel's main restaurant. Panorama Restaurant offers a panoramic view of Al Mayah Bay and serves dinner. Guests can enjoy lunch, snacks and drinks around the pool.

Guests can choose from a variety of sports, including basketball, squash, tennis and diving. They can also visit the fitness center and sauna, or indulge in massage treatments.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Naama Bay is a 5-minute drive away, and free public parking is available on site. Sharm El Sheikh Airport is 20 km away, and car rentals are available.

Couples particularly liked the location, rated it 8.1 for a two-person trip.

Name: Coral Sea Aqua Club Resort
information:
Located in Sharm El Sheikh, Coral Sea Aqua Club Resort provides accommodations with a fitness center, a garden and a terrace. This property is located a short distance from Located in Sharm El Sheikh, Coral Sea Aqua Club Resort provides accommodations with a fitness center, a garden and a terrace. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as International Conference Center - Jolie Ville Hotels and The Heavenly Cathedral, and guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units at Coral Sea Aqua Club Resort offer views of the pool. Each room has a kettle. Guest rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub.

This property offers a halal breakfast or buffet breakfast. There is an on-site restaurant that serves a variety of international dishes.

Coral Sea Aqua Club Resort has an outdoor pool, and guests can play table tennis at this hotel.

Staff at the reception can assist guests with answering their questions.

Coral Sea Aqua Club Resort is 2.5 km from Naama Bay, while SOHO Square Sharm El Sheikh is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, 12 km from the property.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated it 8.6 for a two-person trip.

Name: Old Vic Sharm Resort
information:
This property is 5 minutes walk from the beach. Old Vic Sharm Resort is located in Sharm El Sheikh, 5 km from Naama Bay. It features a year-round outdoor pool and barbecue facilities. The hotel has a spa center and terrace, while guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are available on site.

All rooms at this hotel are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units feature a seating area, where guests can relax. Guests will enjoy a kettle in the room. All rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. Guests also enjoy bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer for added convenience.

Guests at the property will enjoy shops and a 24-hour front desk.

Aqua Park is 1.8 km from Old Vic Sharm Resort, while Sharm Supermarket is 1.9 km away. Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is the nearest airport to Old Vic Sharm Resort, 17 km away.

Name: Badawia Sharm Resort
information:
situated in Sharm El Sheikh, 1.3 km from Reef Beach, Badawia Sharm Resort features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The hotel has family rooms.

At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony. At Badawia Sharm Resort rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near Badawia Sharm Resort include Sharm El Maya Bay Beach, Ras Um El Sid Beach and Il Mercato Mall. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

Name: Domina Coral Bay Elisir Suites
information:
Located in Sharm El Sheikh, Domina Coral Bay Elisir Suites offers beachfront accommodation a few steps from Domina Coral Bay Beach, and features various facilities, such as a restaurant, a bar and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a water park. The hotel offers an indoor pool, fitness center, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk.

The units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom with a hot tub, bathrobes and slippers. All rooms at Domina Coral Bay Elisir Suites are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a continental or ˆ la carte breakfast.

Domina Coral Bay Elisir Suites features a wellness area that includes a hot spring bath, hammam and sauna. You can play billiards, table tennis and mini golf at the hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling.

Gardens Bay Beach is less than 1 km from Domina Coral Bay Elisir Suites, while Sharks Bay Beach is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, 6 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

your stay include:
 Wi-Fi Hot tub, Jacuzzi, Sauna, Sun terrace, Terrace

Name: Fun & Sun Smart Seti Sharm
information:
Smart City Sharm Hotel features a fitness center, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Sharm El Sheikh. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a year-round outdoor pool. The property offers evening entertainment and a kids' club.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at Fun & Sun Smart Seti Sharm can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The property offers a children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at Fun & Sun Smart Seti Sharm.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Sharm El Maya Bay Beach, Ras Umm El Sid Beach and Old Market. The nearest airport is Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, 16 km from Fun & Sun Smart Seti Sharm.

Name: Marina Sharm Hotel
information:
This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Overlooking a private beach and the turquoise waters of Naama Bay, Marina Sharm Hotel offers spacious rooms, most with private balconies. There are 2 outdoor pools and a wellness center. Free WiFi is available in the lobby area.

All rooms at this 4-star hotel feature floor-to-ceiling windows and modern-style furniture. They all include air conditioning, minibar, flat-screen satellite TV and views of the Red Sea.

Dining places at Marina Sharm include the Mermaid Seafood Restaurant, which also serves Italian cuisine, and the Beach Bar offers cocktails, refreshing drinks and live music performances.

Guests of Marina Sharm can enjoy a rejuvenating massage treatment or relax in the spa pool, hammam or sauna. This hotel has a children's playground and a games room with a billiards table.

Marina Sharm is located 11 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, 7 km from the Old Market and a 15-minute drive from the city centre. This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk.

This is a favorite area of ??Sharm El Sheikh among our guests, based on independent reviews.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated it 8.7 for a two-person trip.

Name: Falcon Hills Hotel
information:
This property is an 11-minute walk from the beach. Overlooking the Sinai Mountains, Falcon Hills Hotel offers value-for-money accommodation with 2 beaches nearby. It features 2 outdoor pools, tennis courts and a spa with massage treatments.

The hotel is located on the plateau of Ras Umm Sid and offers snorkeling equipment to explore the coral reefs of the Red Sea. Amphora Beach is only 750 meters away, while the private Falcon Hills Beach can be reached with a free shuttle service.

All rooms open to a private balcony and feature satellite TV, en suite bathrooms with bathtub and shower. Air conditioning is standard.

Guests can have refreshing drinks around the clock and make use of the pool bar. A free shuttle service is available to the famous Naama Bay. Sharm El Sheikh Airport is 17 km away and free private parking is available at the hotel.

Name: TOLIP Golden Plaza Hotel
information:
Enjoy unprecedented distinction during your stay here thanks to free Wi-Fi in all rooms. The property is located in Heliopolis, which puts you close to Cairo's tourist attractions and famous restaurants there. Don't end your trip before visiting the most famous Museum of Egyptian Antiquities. This distinguished property's score of 5 is not for nothing, as it provides guests with a special stay thanks to the presence of a massage, a gym and a spa. Name: The Guard hotel
information:
Located in the heart of Heliopolis, this hotel features 132 suites, guest rooms, an outdoor pool and barbecue facilities. The hotel also has a children's playground and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy meals at various restaurants, and private parking is available on site.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, and some units offer views of the pool or garden. The rooms are also equipped with a private bathroom with a bathtub. The Guard Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.
The residence has a 24-hour front desk.

The Guard Hotel is located 10 km from the Saudi German Hospital. The mosque is also located inside the hotel, and Roxy Cinema is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 4.1 km from The Guard Hotel.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 8.2 for a two-person trip.

Name: Victory Of Downtown Hotel
information:
Offering a bar, terrace and views of city, Victory Of Downtown Hotel is located in Cairo, 1.1 km from Khan Al Khalili. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property Accommodation The accommodation features room service, a shared lounge, and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with shower, slippers and a hairdryer. The rooms also provide a desk and a kettle for guests.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Victory Of Downtown Hotel.

Meeting and banquet facilities, a business center and an ATM are provided for the convenience of business travelers.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include The Egyptian Museum, Al Moez Street and Tahrir Square. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 16 km from Victoria Of Downtown Hotel. The property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.

Name: Valencia Hotel, Downtown Cairo
information:
Located in Cairo and with Tahrir Square reachable within 1 km, Valencia Hotel, Downtown Cairo provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, BBQ facilities, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers Room service and an ATM. This property features a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen, and currency exchange service for guests.

The rooms in this hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with bidet, bathrobes and slippers. Some units at Valencia Hotel, Downtown Cairo also have a balcony. The rooms include a kettle, while the rooms in This accomodation includes bed linen and towels.

Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at Valencia Hotel,Downtown Cairo.

This hotel offers a terrace.

The Egyptian Museum is 2.3 km from Valencia Hotel,Downtown Cairo, while Khan Al Khalili is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 19 km from the property. The property offers an airport shuttle service at an extra cost.

This is a favorite area of ??Cairo among our guests, based on independent reviews.

Couples particularly liked the location, rating it 9.1 for a two-person trip.

Name: Tolip Aswan Hotel
information:
Tolip Aswan Hotel is located on the River Nile in the city center and offers beautiful views of the Nile. It features a fully equipped gym, table tennis and various entertainment options such as bowling and a cinema.

All rooms and chalets have a balcony overlooking the Nile and are furnished in a homely style. All rooms offer a satellite TV, minibar and an en suite bathroom with shower.

Tolip Aswan offers a wide range of buffets and ˆ la carte menus where guests can savor their meals while enjoying the view of the Nile. Cocktails are served at the Lobby Bar, Pool Bar and Isis Pub.

The hotel's health club offers a sauna, steam bath and various massage treatments, all for an extra fee. A children's playground is also available at the hotel.

Guests can visit the Nobel's tomb, which is 10 minutes away by speedboat from Tolip Aswan Hotel. Aswan Airport is 21 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated it 8.6 for a two-person trip.

Name: Pyramisa Island Hotel Aswan
information:
The resort is located in the middle of the Nile on an island near the center of Aswan, 28 acres of lush gardens with stunning views of the Nile, the mountains and the city of Aswan.

Pyramisa Resort is only minutes sailing from the Aga Khan Mausoleum and the market area in the city center. All 450 rooms and suites enjoy panoramic views of the Nile, mountains, tropical gardens, and swimming pools. Our spacious and comfortable rooms are elegantly furnished with modern facilities and a spa.

Guests can request to arrange a pick-up service form the airport to the hotel for the charge, using the hotel contact details in the confirmation email received.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 8.4 for a two-person trip.

Name: Hapi Hotel
information:
Set in Aswan, 24 km from Aga Khan Mausoleum, Hapi Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi. This property offers a concierge service Luggage storage area for guests.

Each room at this hotel includes a wardrobe, TV, private bathroom, linen and towels, and all units come with a minibar for guests.

A continental breakfast is served daily at Hapi Hotel.

A tour desk and car rental are available, while the business center has a fax machine and photocopier.

Popular points of interest near this accommodation include Plantation Island, Nubian Museum and Ferry Operator. The nearest airport is Aswan International Airport, 21 km from Hapi Hotel.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 8.5 for a two-person trip.

Name: The Mango Guest House
information:
This property is a 3-minute walk from the beach. The Mango Guest House is located in Aswan, 700 meters from Aswan Christian Cathedral and 1 km from El Tabia Mosque. The guest house has a barbecue and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant .

All rooms have a TV with satellite channels. Some units have a seating area where you can relax. Guests can enjoy a cup of coffee on their balcony or terrace. All rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers .

The Mango Guesthouse offers free WiFi and there is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The Mango Guest House is 1.5 km from Ferry Company, while Tourist info (Pamphlets & convoy times) is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Aswan International Airport, 16 km from the property.

Couples particularly liked the location, rating it 9.2 for a two-person trip.

Name: Benben by Dhara Hotels - Adults Only
information:
Benben by Dhara Hotels - Adults Only is an adults-only property that offers a bar and a terrace in Aswan. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the restaurant Light foods.

The rooms in this hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a lake view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box. Some rooms offer mountain views. All guest rooms have a wardrobe and a kettle.

Continental and a la carte breakfast options are served every morning at Benben by Dhara Hotels - Adults Only.

The property is 8 km from Tomb of the Aga Khan, while Aswan High Dam is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Aswan International Airport, 9 km from Benben by Dhara Hotels - Adults Only.

Couples particularly liked the location, rating it 9.2 for a two-person trip.

Name: Citymax Hotel Aswan
information:
Located in Kornish Al Nile, Citymax Hotel Aswan offers an outdoor pool. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. There is a restaurant serving Middle Eastern cuisine, and free parking is provided.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a desk. Citymax Hotel Aswan features some rooms with river views, and each room is fitted with a kettle. All rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property.

Citymax Hotel Aswan offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna.

Speaking Arabic, French and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Aswan is 700 meters from the hotel.

Couples particularly liked the location, and rated it 9.0 for a two-person trip.

Name: Obelisk Nile Hotel Aswan
information:
Pyramisa Isis Corniche Aswan Resort is located on the Nile Corniche, a 5-minute drive from Aswan city centre. All rooms offer garden views. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas throughout the hotel lobby.

The elegantly furnished guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning and cable TV. All rooms have a spacious work desk.

Pyramisa Isis offers an outdoor swimming pool with a bar and plenty of sun loungers. The hotel also has a fitness center and massage service.

The unique restaurant has a riverside terrace where you can enjoy breakfast and dinner. Several dining options are also available in the adjacent mall.

Couples particularly liked the location, rating it 9.1 for a two-person trip.

Name: Opal privat nubian hotel
information:
This property is a 3-minute walk from the beach. Opal privat nubian hotel is located in Aswan, 24 km from Tomb of the Aga Khan. It is a beachfront property with various facilities, such as a restaurant, a bar and barbecue facilities. The property also provides guests with room service and a sun terrace It features a night club and a 24-hour front desk.

Rooms at this hotel offer air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Opal privat nubian hotel offers a continental or ˆ la carte breakfast.

The area is popular for snorkeling and cycling, and car rental is available at the property.

Popular points of interest near Opal privat nubian hotel include Island of Plants, Nubian Museum and Unfinished Obelisk. The nearest airport is Aswan International Airport, 20 km away. The property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated it 9.4 for a trip for two.

Name: Citymax aqua park Hotel Aswan
information:
Located in Aswan and with Tomb of the Aga Khan reachable within 11 km, Citymax aqua park Hotel Aswan provides express check-in and check-out, rooms, a bar, free WiFi and a garden. This hotel has family rooms.

All guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bidet, slippers and a wardrobe. Some units in the hotel have views of the pool. The rooms are equipped with a balcony. The units come with a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Continental and buffet breakfast options are served every morning at Citymax aqua park Hotel Aswan.

This property offers a sun terrace.

Citymax aqua park Hotel Aswan is 11 km from Plantation Island, while Nubian Museum is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Aswan International Airport, 25 km from this hotel. The property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Philae Hotel
information:
Philae Hotel is located in Aswan, along the Nile Corniche. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with balconies overlooking the Nile. It features free Wi-Fi in all areas and a restaurant that serves American breakfast.

All rooms and apartments at Philae Hotel are individually decorated. All feature ornate furniture and rich fabrics. The apartment includes a living room equipped with a dining area and a flat-screen TV, while the kitchen has a refrigerator.

Guests can benefit from easy access to the city using Aswan Train Station, 1 km away by car. Aswan International Airport is an 18 km drive away. An airport shuttle service is also available upon request.

Couples particularly loved the location, rating it 9.1 for a two-person trip.

Name: Panorama Port Said Hotel
information:
Located in Port Said, Panorama Portsaid Hotel offers simply furnished rooms with views of the Mediterranean Sea. Wi-Fi is available in all areas.

All rooms provide its guests with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a balcony. The private bathroom includes a bathtub. Extras include a minibar and satellite channels.

Guests can enjoy local and international menu options in the restaurant or in the room. Room service is available around the clock.

A 24-hour front desk and a mini-market are available at Panorama Portsaid Hotel. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. The property also offers free parking at a nearby location.

Couples particularly liked the location, rating it 9.2 for a two-person trip.

Name: Grand Hotel Port Said
information:
Located in Port Said, 1.9 km from Iskenderun Ferry Pier (Port Said), Grand Hotel Port provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with Free WiFi is available throughout the property, and this hotel features family rooms.

This hotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

Couples particularly liked the location, and rated it 9.0 for a two-person trip.

Name: Jewel El Gameel Hotel
information:
Set in Port Said, 3.5 km from Iskenderun Ferry Pier (Port Said), Jewel El Gameel Hotel offers accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a garden and a terrace. All rooms include a balcony with lake views.

Each room at this hotel is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a safety deposit box, as well as a private bathroom with a bidet, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Rooms at Jewel El Gameel Hotel are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is served daily at this property.

Guests at Jewel El Gameel Hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Port Said, like cycling.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak Arabic and English.

Name: Palma Hotel
information:
This property is 2 minutes walk from the beach. Palma Hotel is located in Port Said and features a restaurant, outdoor pool, bar and fitness center. This 4-star hotel includes free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk and room service. This hotel has a garden And a terrace.

This hotel offers guests air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, kettle, microwave, refrigerator, safety deposit box, flat-screen TV, balcony and a private bathroom with shower. All rooms at Palma Hotel are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the property.

Palma Hotel is located 3 km from Iskenderun (Port Said) ferry pier.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 8.4 for a two-person trip.

Name: Resta Port Said Hotel
information:
This property is 3 minutes walk from the beach. Resta Hotel has a stunning location near the Mediterranean Sea, overlooking passing ships and boats right at the entrance to the Suez Canal. It also features a contemporary building and an outdoor swimming pool.

The rooms at Resta Port Said Hotel are furnished with traditional Egyptian textiles and have large windows overlooking the canal or the city. All rooms are air-conditioned, equipped with TVs with satellite channels and include en suite bathrooms.

Guests can enjoy a mixture of classic Egyptian and Italian cuisine at the hotel's restaurant. They can also enjoy drinks at the bar and relax on the terrace, which faces the spacious pool grounds.

Vital attractions close to the hotel include the Pharaonic Obelisks and the administration headquarters of the Suez Canal Authority, which are less than 10 minutes' walk away. Free private parking is available on site.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated it 9.4 for a trip for two.

Name: Jewel Port Said Hotel
information:
Located in Port Said, Jewel Port Said Hotel is 2.7 km from Iskenderun Ferry Pier (Port Said), a beachfront property that provides various facilities, such as a restaurant, a shared lounge and a terrace. This property includes a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests .

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms offer sea views. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at Jewel Port Said Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Name: De La Poste
information:
Set in Port Said, 2.5 km from Iskenderun (Port Said) Ferry Pier, De La Poste is air-conditioned accommodation with a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi. family.

All rooms at this hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Bed linen and towels are provided in the rooms at De La Poste.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at this property.

De La Poste offers a terrace.

information:

Name: Adriatica Hotel
information:
Adriatica Hotel is located in Marsa Matruh, near Rommel Beach. During their stay, guests can enjoy free wireless internet.

The hotel offers concierge/concierge, 24-hour reception and ticket service. On warm days, the outdoor terrace offers a great place to soak up the sun.

The hotel has 55 rooms with everything necessary to ensure an enjoyable stay.

Adriatica Hotel has an excellent location, allowing guests to have access to many attractions and restaurants. It is easy to get to Mersa Matruh airport, it is a 10-minute drive from the hotel.

Name: Jazz Almaza Bay
information:
Featuring an indoor pool, outdoor tennis courts and a private beach, Jaz Almaza Beach Resort is a luxurious accommodation in Marsa Matruh. The many facilities this upscale resort features include a sauna, a Jacuzzi and a kids club.

The resort includes 395 air-conditioned rooms. There are also many rooms available for families.

The Morgana Restaurant, located within the Jaz Almaza Beach Resort, is a popular place to enjoy dinner. In the evening, guests can also enjoy a drink in the cozy lounge bar. There are also a number of types of drinks that guests can enjoy at the outdoor bar, which overlooks the sea.

The resort is close to the popular attractions of Marsa Matruh, a few minutes' walk from Almaza Bay Beach. We provide a variety of services including free nearby private car parking and airport transfers.

Name: Beau Site Hotel
information:
This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Featuring a private sandy beach, Beau Site Marsa Matrouh is a historic hotel located 10 minutes' walk from the city centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, 2 restaurants and a garden.

All accommodation at Beau Site Marsa Matrouh Hotel offers views of the garden and the sea. All rooms and suites include a minibar, wardrobe and satellite TV. There is a private bathroom in all units.

Located on the beachfront and overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, La Hutte serves breakfast and dinner buffets including international dishes. You can also dine at The Panorama Restaurant, which serves ˆ la carte menu and light meals.

The tour desk can arrange local excursions and you can enjoy a range of water sports as well as fishing and canoeing activities for a fee.

An international bowling center is a short walk from Beau Site Marsa Matrouh Hotel, and you can drive to Marsa Matrouh International Airport in 15 minutes by car. Free private parking is available on site.

Couples particularly liked the location, rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.

Name: Negresco Hotel
information:
This property is 1 minute walk from the beach, featuring a shared lounge. Located in Marsa Matruh in the Marsa Matruh region, Negresco Hotel is 18 km from Cleopatra Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and Free Wi-Fi and room service, this hotel offers family rooms.

Guests of this hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast or an a la carte breakfast.

Guests at Negresco Hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mersa Matruh, like fishing.

Couples particularly liked the location, rating it 9.2 for a two-person trip.

Name: Bader Hotel
information:
Boasting a terrace, Al Bader Hotel is situated in Marsa Matruh, within 5 km of Cleopatra Beach and 24 km of Agieba Marsah Matruh beach.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet. A fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle.

Wonderful view on Mediterranean Sea is 24 km from the aparthotel.

Name: El Obeid Hotel for the Armed Forces, Marsa Matrouh
information:
With sea views, El Obayed Apartments Armed Forces is located in Marsa Matruh, a restaurant, a shared lounge, a snack bar, a garden and a terrace. Private parking is available on site.

The units are fitted with tiled floors and come with a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a dining area, a TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower.

Guests can go cycling in the vicinity of the property if they wish to explore the area.

This aparthotel is located 6 km from Agiba Beach, Marsa Matrouh, and a Wonderful View on Mediterranean Sea.

Name: Jewel Matrouh Hotel
information:
Set in Marsa Matruh, 3.4 km from Cleopatra Beach, Jewel Matrouh Hotel offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden. rooms for guests.

This resort provides guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, kettle, minibar, safety deposit box and flat-screen TV, as well as a private bathroom with bidet. Each room at Jewel Matrouh Hotel includes bed linen and towels.

Guests of the property can enjoy a continental or ˆ la carte breakfast.

Jewel Matrouh Hotel offers a sun terrace.

Name: Porto Matrouh Aqua Park
information:
Located in Marsa Matruh, 600 meters from Star Matrouh Beach, Porto Matrouh Aqua Park Resort provides accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a garden and a private beach area. In-house, night club and 24-hour front desk.

The resort includes a children's playground, and the area is popular for cycling, and car rental is available at Porto Matrouh Aqua Park Resort.

The property is 2.1 km from Cleopatra Beach and 16 km from Agiba Beach in Marsa Matruh.

Name: Long Island, Marsa Matrouh
information:
This property is a 6-minute walk from the beach. Located just 500 meters from Island Beach, Long Island Village Hotel Chalet - Marsa Matruh provides accommodation in Marsa Matruh with access to an outdoor swimming pool, barbecue facilities, as well as a 24-hour front desk. This apartment features a private pool, a garden and free private parking.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided.

A terrace is available on site and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of the apartment.

Cleopatra Beach is 7 km from Long Island Village Hotel Chalet - Marsa, while Agieba Marsah Matruh beach is 25 km away.

Name: Tolip Alexandria HotelOpens
information:
This 5-star hotel in Alexandria features an outdoor pool, spa and gym. It also offers modern accommodation overlooking the sea or the city. There is free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All suites have a living room and a dining table. Featuring a bathtub and shower, the private bathrooms are also stocked with free toiletries. All rooms also have a balcony.

Guests can choose to dine at any of the hotel's 9 dining outlets, which serve a range of cuisines ranging from local to international. The pool bars are an ideal place to relax.

The hotel is 400 meters from the Peace Theater and Stanley Bridge and 1.5 km from Sidi Gaber Railway Station. Borg El Arab International Airport is 42 km away. The property also offers parking at an additional cost.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip.

Name: Sunrise Alex Avenue Hotel
information:
This property is a 3-minute walk from the beach. Enjoying a seafront location in Alexandria city centre, SUNRISE Alex Avenue Hotel features a private beach. All rooms offer panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel has 2 outdoor pools and a spa.

All rooms and suites at SUNRISE Alex Avenue Hotel feature a balcony and feature modern dŽcor. Each suite includes a seating area with a sofa, flat-screen TV and electric kettle. The bathroom includes a bathtub and a hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy exquisite international cuisine and an oriental breakfast buffet at the Mediterranean Restaurant. Featuring a seafront location, Laguna Terrace serves light meals, while cocktails are served at the Lounge and Montreal Bar.

The hotel has a fully equipped gym with cardio machines and a spa that offers relaxation treatments and massages to guests. A hot tub and steam room are also available for more relaxation options.

SUNRISE Alex Avenue Hotel is located only 3 km from the city center and the magnificent New Alexandria Library, and a 10 km drive from Alexandria Airport. Wi-Fi is available upon request.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 9.7 for a two-person trip.

Name: Jewel San Stefano Hotel
information:
This property is a 1-minute walk from the beach. Jewel San Stefano Hotel is located in Alexandria and features a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden. Featuring family rooms and a terrace for guests, this property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. Fi for free.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a hairdryer and a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is served daily at this hotel.

The nearest airport is Borg El Arab International Airport, 61 km from the accommodation.

Located directly on the Alexandria Corniche, this hotel features a private beach, and is next to the luxurious San Stefano Mall.

In the evening, a range of international dishes are served, and the morning breakfast is served as an open buffet.

Couples particularly liked the location, rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.

Name: Regency Hotel Alexandria
information:
This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Located in Alexandria, Regency Hotel features a private beach and a restaurant. Free Wi-Fi in public areas are also available. There are a number of fast food chains within walking distance.

All rooms feature panoramic or side sea views. All suites have a large living room equipped with a satellite TV and minibar. The bathroom includes a shower. Some also feature a balcony.

This bed and breakfast is 3.4 km from Mamoura Beach, 6.5 km from Stanley Bridge and 7.3 km from Al Salam Theatre. Borg El Arab International Airport is 41 km from the hotel.

Name: Royal Crown Hotel
information:
This property is 12 minutes' walk from the beach. Located in Alexandria, 1.7 km from Stanley Beach, Royal Crown Hotel is air-conditioned accommodations offering a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel also includes free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk, and room service. This hotel has family rooms.

The rooms at this hotel provide a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms at Royal Crown Hotel feature a seating area.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or buffet breakfast.

The Royal Crown Hotel is 4.3 km from Alexandria Zoo, and 8 km from Catacombs of Kom el Shoqafa. The nearest airport is Borg El Arab International Airport, 52 km away.

Couples particularly liked the location, rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.

Name: Kaoud Sporting Hotel
information:
Kaoud Sporting Hotel, a property with a terrace, is located in Alexandria, 2.1 km from Stanley Beach and 6 km from Alexandria Zoo. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi in Throughout, the hotel has family rooms.

The rooms in this hotel are fitted with a wardrobe. All rooms include a private bathroom and air conditioning. Some rooms offer a balcony. All guest rooms have a safety deposit box.

Kaoud Sporting Hotel is 10 km from Catacombs of Kom el Shoqafa, while Stanley Bridge is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Borg El Arab International Airport, 55 km from the property.

Couples particularly liked the location, rated it 8.1 for a two-person trip.

Name: Semiramis Hotel Alexandria
information:
Semiramis is a beachfront hotel located in the center of Alexandria. It offers a restaurant and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Alexandria Zoo is 4 km away.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathrooms come with a shower and a bathtub. Some rooms have a balcony and offer a view of the sea.

At Semiramis Hotel there is a 24-hour front desk. This property has free parking.

The hotel is 1.1 km from Alexandria Library, 1.7 km from Catacombs of Kom el Shoqafa and 8 km from San Stefano Mall. Borg El Arab International Airport is 37 km away.

Couples particularly liked the location, rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.

Name: Alexander The Great Hotel
information:
This property is 12 minutes' walk from the beach. Located in the center of Alexandria, Alexander the Great Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with balconies and free WiFi. Overlooking the Episcopal Church, the hotel features a tour desk and a 24-hour front desk.

This hotel offers spacious rooms with satellite TV and a telephone, just a 15-minute drive from the Bibliotheca Alexandrina. All rooms have a minibar and a private bathroom with shower.

Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast in the dining area or in the privacy of their room. The hotel's ˆ la carte restaurant serves local dishes, and there are also a variety of restaurants in the vicinity.

Alexander the Great Hotel is located 5 minutes from the seafront Corniche promenade in Alexandria. Alexandria International Airport is 5 km away, and car rentals are also available.

Name: Windsor Palace Hotel Alexandria
information:
This accomodation was 9 minutes walk from the beach This luxurious hotel dates back to the early 20th century and is located on Alexandria's seafront, where breakfast can be enjoyed on the rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the Corniche.

The elegant rooms at Windsor Palace Hotel feature high ceilings and hand-carved dŽcor. All rooms have been completely renovated and equipped with all new technology (flat screen TV, private satellite TV in all rooms with about a thousand channels and free WiFi).

Enjoy light meals and refreshments al fresco at Prince Charles CafŽ, which overlooks the sea. The Queen Elizabeth Hall Restaurant, decorated with antiques and murals, serves fine food and fine wines.

Enjoy ˆ la carte cuisine at Blue Harbor Restaurant & CafŽ, and spend unforgettable DJ nights in the Skyroof Club Lounge.

Guests can enjoy the hotel's ideal location as it is in the city's cultural and social centre. There are many street cafes, shops and seaside promenades near the hotel. The Alexandria Library is 1 km from the property.

Please note that this property does not have a pool or private beach, but guests have free access to the pool and private beach at Paradise Inn Beach Resort which is a different property in the same group of hotels.

The 24-hour front desk can arrange car rentals, dry cleaning services, and recommend attractions and restaurants in the vicinity.

This hotel is a 2-minute walk from the Raml Train Station and the sandy beaches, 1.5 km from the Alexandria Library and the Diving Center, while the property is 1 km from Constantine Cavafy.

Couples particularly liked the location, rating it 9.2 for a two-person trip.

Name: Eastern Montazah Hotel
information:
Eastern Al Montazah Hotel is a modern oriental luxury hotel located near the Royal Montazah Gardens, Mamoura Beach and Abu Qir Historic District.

The hotel offers 56 rooms and suites, most of which overlook the private pool. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a minibar, hairdryer and digital safety deposit box. They also include free Wi-Fi and TV with international channels. Some rooms feature a seating area where guests can Relax in it after a busy day.

The hotel has an outdoor heated pool, a gym and a health club that includes a sauna and a steam room. The spa also offers a hot tub and massage services at an extra cost. Guests can enjoy a meal at the property's restaurant. The property has a 24-hour front desk Clock and gift shop and shops.

Catacombs of Kom el Shoqafa is 15 km from Eastern El Montazah Hotel, while San Stefano Grand Plaza is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Borg El Arab International Airport, 51 km from the property. Free private parking is available on site.

Name: Sky View Suites Hotel
information:
This property is a 5-minute walk from the beach. Sky View Suites Hotel is located in Hurghada and features a restaurant, an outdoor pool, a bar and a shared lounge. The property is just a few steps from Haroni Beach and 250 meters from The View Hurghada Beach, and offers a garden and a private beach area. It features a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.

All guest rooms in this hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a safety deposit box, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. All rooms at Sky View Suites Hotel include bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Sky View Suites Hotel has a sun terrace.

The hotel is 550 meters from El Mahmya Beach and 3.5 km from New Marina. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 9 km from Sky View Suites Hotel.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated it 8.6 for a two-person trip..

Name: Canary Hotel
information:
This property is 12 minutes' walk from the beach. Located in Hurghada, 1.1 km from El Sawaki Beach, Canary Hotel provides air-conditioned accommodation and a shared lounge. All rooms feature satellite TV and a private bathroom. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and ticket service for guests.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a wardrobe.

Guests at Canary Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Giftun Island is 4.4 km from the accommodation, while New Marina is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 8 km from Canary Hotel.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 8.2 for a two-person trip.

Name: Gravity Hotel & Aqua Park Hurghada
information:
This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Samra Bay Hotel & Resort is located in Hurghada, 11 km from New Marina. It features a private beach area, 4 outdoor pools and a fitness centre. The 5-star hotel has a garden and air-conditioned rooms. The property also provides guests with an ATM and a 24-hour front desk. The property also offers free WiFi in the lobby.

The guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. The rooms have a private bathroom, while some offer a view of the sea. Each room at Samra Bay Hotel & Resort includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner are served daily at the property.

You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and limousine service is available.

The nearby Hurghada International Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

Name: TUI MAGIC LIFE Kalawy
information:
Set in Hurghada, 39 km from Dax Dive Center, TUI MAGIC LIFE Kalawy offers accommodation with a bar, free private parking, a shared lounge and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and WiFi Free of charge, a restaurant, meeting and banquet facilities, outdoor swimming pool, children's playground, fitness center, hot tub and water park are at guests' disposal.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at this hotel.

The 5-star TUI MAGIC LIFE Kalawy offers a sauna and a sun terrace. You can also play table tennis and darts at the property, and the area is popular for snorkeling and canoeing.

The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 90 km from TUI MAGIC LIFE Kalawy.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 8.4 for a two-person trip.

Name: Eiffel Hotel Hurghada
information:
This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. The Eiffel Hotel features simple dŽcor and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony overlooking the Red Sea. The outdoor pool is surrounded by sun loungers, and it also has a pool bar. There is free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

The spacious rooms and suites feature satellite TV and a minibar. They are decorated with wooden furniture and tiled floors.

The Eiffel Hotel's restaurant serves meals in buffet style, and room service is available, including breakfast. A variety of drinks are also available at the bar.

Hotel Eiffel organizes water activities such as diving, windsurfing and snorkeling. Staff at the hotel's tour desk can provide information on excursions.

Hurghada city center and the yacht marina are within walking distance of the hotel. Hurghada International Airport is 6 km away. Luggage storage is available at the 24-hour front desk. The staff can also arrange a laundry service, which includes ironing.

Name: A1 Tiba Rose
information:
Set in Hurghada, A1 Tiba Rose is a beachfront property 150 meters from Al Sawaki Beach and features various facilities, such as a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool and a private beach area. Airport transfers, room service and free WiFi are available throughout the property.

The hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, wardrobe, flat-screen TV, private bathroom, bed linen and towels, and a patio with sea view. Rooms include a kettle, while some rooms have a kitchen equipped with a microwave and oven. Rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

A1 Tiba Rose offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

Elysees Dream Beach is 1.3 km from the property, while Qism Hurghada Public Beach is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 11 km away.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 8.4 for a two-person trip.

Name: Diana Hotel Hurghada
information:
This property is 4 minutes walk from the beach. Diana Hurghada Hotel is located in the heart of Hurghada, 500 meters from the local sandy beach. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi in public areas. While Khan El Khalili Mall is a 10-minute drive away.

Most of the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Diana feature a balcony overlooking the sea. Fitted with wooden furniture, it also includes a minibar, wardrobe and a private bathroom.

There is a restaurant and a bar at the hotel. For an extra fee, you can use the swimming pool and the private beach at Geisum Village, 100 meters from the hotel.

Hurghada International Airport is a 20-minute drive from Diana Hotel, and a shuttle service can be arranged upon request. Free public parking is available nearby.

Name: Magic Beach Hotel Hurghada
information:
This property is 4 minutes walk from the beach. Magic Beach Hotel Hurghada is located in Hilal district and features panoramic views of the Red Sea. It has an outdoor pool, a private beach and a shopping centre. Diving and fishing activities can be arranged by a team of professionals.

All rooms at Magic Beach have a balcony overlooking the sea. They also all have a flat-screen TV, minibar and wardrobe. The suites include a living room with a sofa. The bathroom includes a shower.

The hotel's main restaurant serves an international buffet every day for all three meals, while Paradise Restaurant and Bar offers ˆ la carte menus and drinks. Cocktails and non-alcoholic or wine-free cocktails can be enjoyed at the beach bar overlooking the beach.

Guests can enjoy an invigorating workout in the fully equipped gym. The hotel's spa includes a number of relaxing massage treatments. A game of table tennis is also available on site for young adults.

The city center with its many restaurants and shops is a 10-minute drive from Magic Beach Hotel. Hurghada International Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Free public parking is available at a location nearby.

Name: Elaria Hotel Hurgada
information:
This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Elaria Hotel Hurgada is located in Hurghada, 3.1 km from New Marina and 7 km from Hurghada District Court. The hotel has a spa center and hot spring bath, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant.

Each room at this hotel features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. While some rooms feature views of the sea or the city. All rooms have a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower.

There is a 24-hour front desk, hairdresser and gift shop at the property.

This hotel has a private beach area, and bike rental and car rental are available. Guests can play billiards at the hotel. Giftun Island is 8 km from Elaria Hurgada Hotel, while TU Berlin Campus El Gouna is 28 km away. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 5 km from Elaria Hurgada Hotel.

Couples particularly liked the location, rating it 8.3 for a two-person trip.

Name: Captain's Inn Hotel
information:
This property is 2 minutes walk from the beach. Overlooking the beautiful Abu Tig Marina, this hotel is a short walk from the beach and the city's services and recreational opportunities.

Captain's Inn offers a bar where you can have drinks on the terrace. You can also dine and enjoy the food, while enjoying the coastal breeze. The marina has a calm atmosphere.

El Gouna is popular for outdoor activities and water sports. With its unique coral reefs, diversity of marine life and crystal clear waters, the hotel is particularly popular for scuba diving. Parasailing, taking a cruise, or cycling to the Bedouin camp is also available. Experience the unique brilliance of the marina with an unforgettable stay.

Couples particularly loved the location, rated 9.7 for a trip for two.

Name: Sonesta St. George Hotel Luxor
information:
Featuring a Jacuzzi, a heated pool and a sauna, Sonesta St. George Hotel Luxor offers luxurious accommodation in Luxor. This contemporary hotel also offers a sun terrace, a beauty center and a coffee bar.

Guests can enjoy the sunny weather on the open terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. There is also a babysitting service, a money changer and a front desk that is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. The hotel offers a fully equipped fitness centre.

The feeling of luxury in each hotel room is complemented by numerous amenities such as a mini bar.

The hotel's restaurant is available for dinner and is an ideal place for a meal if guests do not wish to leave the hotel and take advantage of all the features of the hotel. Breakfast is served daily, and guests can also enjoy breakfast in the privacy of the rooms. A wide variety of restaurants and cafŽs can be found in the area.

The hotel is within walking distance of Luxor Temple. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Luxor.

Name: Iberotel Luxor
information:
Iberotel Luxor is located in Luxor, in an area surrounded by famous tourist attractions. This modern hotel also provides guests with a swimming pool, a 24-hour reception and 24-hour room service.

These air-conditioned rooms offer a mini bar, an in-room safe and a private balcony. There are also plenty of rooms designed especially for families.

Guests of the Iberotel Luxor can relax with a drink at Karkadeh Bar, before a delicious meal at Cote Jardin Restaurant. A variety of restaurants can be found in the area.

The hotel is approximately 10 minutes' walk from Luxor Museum. Luxor International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

Name: Philip Luxor Hotel
information:
Philip Luxor Hotel is located in Luxor and features an indoor pool and provides comfortable accommodation. Guests can also enjoy free Wi-Fi during their stay.

Some of the services offered at the hotel include luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and ticket service. On warm days, the outdoor terrace provides a great place to enjoy under the sun.

Each comfortable room of the hotel has a mini bar and all the basic things to ensure a comfortable stay. All rooms include a mosquito net, a private bathroom and a telephone.

The hotel is ideally located for exploring Luxor, within a 10-minute walk of Luxor Museum, Abu Hajjaj Mosque and Luxor Temple. Tours and excursions can be booked at the reservations office.

Name: Nefertiti Hotel
information:
This hostel for students and youth is located in Luxor and is within a short walk of local attractions, including Abu Hajjaj Mosque and Luxor Temple. Close to the area's attractions and minutes' walk from Luxor Railway Station.

The inn offers 24/7 front desk service as well as a meeting room and free wireless internet in public areas. For added convenience, there is a tour desk, limousine service and ticket service.

These air-conditioned rooms include a telephone and a mini bar.

The inn is within walking distance of Luxor Museum. For more comfort and satisfaction of the guests, there are many restaurants and cafes nearby.

Name: Karnak Luxor Hotel
information:
Luxor Karnak Hotel is located in Luxor and offers free WiFi. Guests can use the heated swimming pool and beauty centre.

Many amenities are available to hotel guests such as airport transfers, express check-in and check-out features and a children's pool. The staff is ready at any time and throughout the week to make reservations for flights and tickets.

The hotel offers 44 air-conditioned rooms and is equipped with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay for its guests. The room also has wireless internet and a mini bar.

The hotel has a conveniently located cafŽ, ideal for those who would like to grab a snack without leaving the hotel. In the evening, guests can also relax in the cozy lounge bar.

Luxor Karnak Hotel is a 20-minute drive from Luxor International Airport. Luxor Temple and Karnak Temple are a short drive away.

Name: Amon Hotel
information:
Located in Luxor, Amoun Hotel features outdoor tennis courts, a rooftop terrace and provides comfortable accommodation. Guests can also enjoy free internet access during their stay.

The hotel offers bright rooms fitted with a hairdryer.

Hotel guests can enjoy dinner at the restaurant located in the same building, this is suitable for guests who prefer to stay in the same building. Take-away lunches are available upon request for those guests who go on day trips in the surrounding area.

Luxor International Airport is a 35-minute drive from Amoun Hotel. The staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Luxor.

Name: Steigenberger Nile Palace Luxor Hotel & Convention Center
information:
Featuring outdoor tennis courts and a limousine service, Steigenberger Nile Palace Luxor is a luxurious accommodation in Luxor. Overlooking the Nile, the hotel offers excellent facilities such as an outdoor swimming pool and a sauna.

The hotel includes 304 modern rooms that include a number of basic amenities to ensure a comfortable stay for the guests.

Steigenberger Nile Palace Luxor boasts convenient dining options, such as international and Italian dishes at The Nubian and Middle Eastern meals at El Tarboush. Every evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A buffet is served every morning.

Steigenberger Nile Palace Luxor has a great location, allowing guests to access plenty of attractions and restaurants. The hotel's multilingual staff is happy to help with information about local places as well as to help organize itineraries for guests.

Name: Jadis Hotel
information:
Qadis Hotel, Apartments & Suites is located in Luxor near Luxor Temple. It also offers a coffee bar, wireless internet in public areas and an outdoor pool.

Guests can enjoy the sunny weather on the open terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. The front desk operates 24/7, and the friendly staff can help you choose places to visit as well as other tourist information.

These air-conditioned rooms offer a private balcony.

Qadis Hotel, apartments and suites offers a variety of dining options, including restaurants, including Gaddis Restaurant and Gaddis Pizza. A variety of restaurants can be found near the hotel.

Cadis Hotel, Apartments & Suites offers easy access to Karnak Temple. For guests traveling by car, parking is available on site.

Name: Royal House Hotel
information:
Royal House Luxor offers a quiet setting in Luxor. The hotel offers 3-star accommodation and air-conditioned rooms.

This hotel has been recently renovated and includes a children's pool, massage services and an outdoor pool. The staff is available at any time and throughout the week to make reservations for flights and tickets.

The hotel includes 30 well-appointed rooms with a number of basic facilities to ensure an enjoyable stay for the guests. The rooms also offer internet access.

Hotel guests can enjoy dinner at the restaurant located in the same building, this is suitable for guests who prefer to stay in the same building. In the evening, guests can relax in the cozy lounge bar. There is a wide choice of restaurants which can be found near the hotel.

Luxor International Airport is a 25-minute drive from Royal House Luxor Hotel. The hotel's multilingual staff is happy to help with information about restaurants as well as help organize tour itineraries for guests.

Name: Manager Hotel
information:
Al Moudira Hotel provides a unique atmosphere for your stay in Luxor. It also provides meeting rooms, a children's pool and an outdoor pool for guests.

Guests of this 4-star hotel can plan their trips through the tour desk. The reception is open 24 hours a day, and the friendly staff can suggest places to visit as well as other tourist information.

The hotel offers spacious rooms equipped with a hairdryer and mini-bar, as well as all the necessary things to ensure a comfortable stay. Honeymoon suites are available at the hotel.

The Director's Hotel offers a daily breakfast and there is a bar where guests can visit, relax and have a drink. A wide choice of restaurants can be found near the hotel.

Al Moudira Hotel's location makes it very easy to access many tourist destinations. Takeaway lunches are prepared in a hotel for those tourists who are in the surrounding area

Name: The Palm Resort Hotel
information:
Facilities offered at this property include a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, as well as free WiFi throughout. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at The Palm Hotel.

This hotel has a terrace.

The Palm Hotel is 42 km from Mansoura and 34 km from Tanta.
